note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
body:
### Links

* [GitHub](https://github.com/motemen)
* [CPAN](https://metacpan.org/author/MOTEMEN)
* [Weblog](http://subtech.g.hatena.ne.jp/motemen/) (ja)

### Products

* [htmlcat](https://metacpan.org/module/htmlcat) Renders standard input in your browser
  * Perl
  * JavaScript
  * Server-Sent Events
* [Teto](https://github.com/motemen/Teto) Web audio streaming server
  * Perl
  * Plack/PSGI streaming
  * AnyEvent, Coro
  * DAAP
  * ffmpeg
* [PicTumblr](https://market.android.com/details?id=net.tokyoenvious.droid.pictumblr) Android Tumblr app
  * Scala
  * Android
* [Kindlenap](https://github.com/motemen/Kindlenap) Generates HTML files from a web page for [kindlegen](http://www.amazon.com/gp/feature.html?ie=UTF8&docId=1000234621)
  * Perl
  * Supports AutoPagerize SITEINFO
* [modoi](https://github.com/motemen/modoi) Futaba channel (http://www.2chan.net/) proxy
  * Perl
  * Pluggable components
  * Hyper estraier-powered search
  * Caches images
  * Automatic refetching
* [euler-getter](http://misc.tokyoenvious.net/euler-getter/) A web implementation of [Euler Getter](http://www.sci.kagoshima-u.ac.jp/~yasuda/Takehiko_Yasudas_homepage/Games.html)
  * Perl
  * JavaScript/jQuery
* [JScriptHTTPGateway](https://gist.github.com/715431) Invoke Windows JScript via HTTP (e.g. curl)
  * C#
* [jusk](https://github.com/motemen/jusk) A study implementation of JavaScript by Haskell
  * Haskell
  * Parsec

### Presentations

 * [Introduction to DBIx::Lite](http://www.slideshare.net/motemen/introduction-to-dbixlite-kyotopm-tech-talk-2) Kyoto.pm tech talk #2
 * Teto - Streaming audio on Plack
   * [YAPC::Asia 2011](https://docs.google.com/present/view?id=dmtb2db_296fqq7fbvj) (ja)
   * [Kansai.pm](https://docs.google.com/present/view?id=dmtb2db_266gwmhdgdn) (ja)
 * [Arrow.js](https://github.com/motemen/arrow-js/wiki/Shibuya.js-in-Kyoto) (ja) Shibuya.js in Kyoto
name: motemen.github.com
